short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Codematic allows you to easily generate QR codes for any site you visit, or even for selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Codematic allows you to easily generate QR codes for any site you visit, or even for selected text. You can then scan the QR code with your mobile phone and have it load the encoded web address or text. But there is more! QR Codematic also includes a QR code scanner: hold any QR code in front of your computer's camera, and your web browser does the rest.
